subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Javier Vazquez, who the Yankees are hoping will be a No. 4 starter disguised as someone better, allowed eight runs and two homers in a loss at St. Petersburg, Fla.
snippet: Javier Vazquez, who the Yankees are hoping will be a No. 4 starter disguised as someone better, allowed eight runs and two homers in a loss at St. Petersburg, Fla.
